biotools.summary: Software for predicting enzyme function from structure rather than sequence. Users input protein coordinates in PDB format to which all known protein structures are compared by 3D structural superposition. Superposition results are displayed through interactive graphics.

bioschemas.name: 3D-Fun
bioschemas.summary: Software for predicting enzyme function from structure rather than sequence. Users input protein coordinates in PDB format to which all known protein structures are compared by 3D structural superposition. Superposition results are displayed through interactive graphics.
